definition: directly and without evasion, characterized by directness in manner or speech
details:
adverb
- directly and without evasion
= example: directly and without evasion
= synonyms: squarely
adjective
- characterized by directness in manner or speech
= example: characterized by directness in manner or speech
= synonyms: point-blank, outspoken, blunt, candid, frank, free-spoken, plainspoken, straight-from-the-shoulder
